templates.description: The ChirpStack open-source LoRaWAN Network Server stack provides open-source components for LoRaWAN networks.

env.label: MODEL
env.name: MODEL
env.description: The model is defined depending on the version of the LoRa concentrator: SX1301, SX1302 and SX1303.

env.label: GW_RESET_GPIO:
env.name: GW_RESET_GPIO:
env.description: GPIO number that resets (Broadcom pin number)

env.label: GW_ENABLE_GPIO
env.name: GW_ENABLE_GPIO
env.description: GPIO number that enables power (by pulling HIGH) to the concentrator (Broadcom pin number)

env.label: TTN_STACK_VERSION
env.description: If using TTN, version of the stack. It can be either 2 (TTNv2) or 3 (TTS Community Edition)

env.label: TTN_REGION
env.name: TTN_REGION
env.description: Region of the TTN server to use, possible values: eu1, nam1, au1; when using TTNv2, possible values are eu, us, in, and au

env.default: change this to your geteway EUI
env.label: GW_ID
env.name: GW_ID

env.default: change this to your own TC key from TTN
env.label: TC_KEY
env.name: TC_KEY
env.description: Unique TTN Gateway Key used for TTS Community Edition pasted from TTN console

templates.name: BasicStation_Packet_Forwarder
templates.title: BasicStation Packet Forwarder

templates.description: Node-RED is a flow-based development tool for visual programming.
templates.name: NodeRed
templates.title: NodeRed
